description.narrative: New East Africa Appeal launched to include SSudan, Kenya, Ethiopia, Somalia in order to match DEC appeal (previous CA EA appeal launched in Feb 2017 didn't include SSudan). Decision taken at alert meeting on 13th March to launch new appeal . DEC formal confirmation of launch on 14th March, with public launch/PJA starting 00.01 15th March. Alert meeting minutes & DEC email attached.

mailing-address.narrative: Christian Aid, 35-41 Lower Marsh, London SE1 7RL, United Kingdom

sector.code: CLIMATE CHANGE MITIGATION/PRO POOR RENEWABLE ENERGY
EMERGENCY RESPONSE – WATER, SANITATION AND HYGIENE
